name: Physician, Heal Thy Elf
description:
Using her shrinking magic, Amelia the Healthy Elf has entered the body of a sick patient to try and find the cause of her illness. Digging through viral crystal build-up and other body gunk, Amelia will delve deeper and deeper until she discovers the cause. She'll have to spend her time wisely: digging for upgrade gems will help her get through more efficiently, but the clock is running--once her magic runs out, she will return to her normal size, and if she's still inside when that happens... It's game over.

Controls: 

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Mouse, LMB - Digging

TAB - Upgrade Shop

No Grapes Games is:

Programming: Nathan Caldwell and Ben Johnson

Story/SFX: Andrew Caldwell

Art: Justin Raimey

Music: Calvin Brown

Made with GODOT 3.3
